concept.title: Internships for Credit
concept.shortdesc: Receiving course credit for an internship

conbody.p: Students may be able to receive course credit in return for an internship. Internships may
You can earn academic credit for up to two internships completed in different semesters. When you are thinking about applying for an intern position, keep in mind two main criteria:

li.p: The internship should involve significant time writing in a professional setting

ul.li: You should be supervised by someone on-site who can teach you relevant professional skills and is willing to provide a progress report and final evaluation

conbody.p: If you need more information or if you have questions about the internship process, please feel free to contact Carlos Evia
